name: Koya Hasa
description: There are a few small boats along the docks. You can see schools of fish swimming in the water below.

name: Manayo Village
description: The village is small but vibrant. Colorful flowers adorn the doorways and paths that weave between buildings. There is a small boat service providing tours into the small adjacent lake.

buildings.name: Kazkagrin's Fortunes
buildings.description: A poorly lit room is surrounded on all sides by maps, clocks, and tapestries. A strange man sits hunched over a table, awaiting your arrival.

name: Wana Tona Lake
description: The lake is dark and deep. Here and there bubbles emerge from the waters. Something lives under here. A wall of reeds blocks off the northern part of the lake.

name: Sotu Nran
description: A small waterfall emerges from the side of the hill behind it.
